description.intro: Developed and maintained web applications using .NET, Angular and SQL Server in oil and medical industries.

highlights.title: Increased development speed and quality by suggesting the use of GIT
highlights.description: Successfully implemented GIT version control, streamlining the development process and improving code quality through collaborative workflows.

highlights.title: Worked closely with the client to implement and modify features
highlights.description: Collaborated closely with clients to gather requirements, design features, and implement them according to their specifications.

highlights.title: Contributed ideas to improve the efficiency and usability of the client's websites
highlights.description: Proactively identified areas for improvement and suggested innovative solutions to enhance user experience and website performance.

highlights.title: Provided support, guidance and instruction to fellow programmers
highlights.description: Mentored and supported junior colleagues, sharing knowledge and expertise to foster a collaborative and productive team environment.
